author: iamarpit-turing
subject_labels: Use Pulumi constructs to define reusable components that can be instantiated for each environment
Implement environment-specific parameter overrides using Pulumi variables or context values
All Lambda functions must use ARM64 architecture for cost optimization
DynamoDB tables must have point-in-time recovery enabled only in production
Use Pulumi outputs to generate environment inventory files for compliance tracking
Implement tagging strategy that includes Environment, CostCenter, and DataClassification tags
